sentences.en: ...the 140 million Americans who wear glasses or contact lenses.
sentences.cn: …1.4亿戴眼镜或者隐性眼镜的美国人。

sentences.en: Dolly's store of drinking glasses had run out.
sentences.cn: 多利存放的酒杯已经用完了。

sentences.en: Glasses of Madeira wine were brought to us. We declared it delicious.
sentences.cn: 端来了几杯马德拉白葡萄酒，我们一致认为它的味道好极了。

sentences.en: Guests were presented with glasses of bubbly on arrival.
sentences.cn: 客人来后，都有香槟酒招待。

sentences.en: He misplaces his reading glasses with such regularity that aides carry extras.
sentences.cn: 他老是记不起把自己阅读时用的放大镜放在什么地方，所以助手们会随身携带备用的。

sentences.en: He was pouring ice and lemonade into tall glasses.
sentences.cn: 他正把冰块和柠檬汽水倒进高脚杯里。

sentences.en: He'd had a few glasses of champagne himself and was fairly mellow.
sentences.cn: 他自己也已几杯香槟下肚，很是飘飘然。
我再次斟满了我们的酒杯。

sentences.en: If he drinks more than two glasses of wine he falls over.
sentences.cn: 他喝酒超过两杯就会醉倒在地。

sentences.en: Its influence can make you view life through rose-coloured glasses.
sentences.cn: 它会让人以过于乐观的态度看待生活。

sentences.en: Nervously clutching our glasses of chilled wine, we gathered on the terrace.
sentences.cn: 我们聚集在露台上,手里紧张地握着盛有冰镇葡萄酒的酒杯.

sentences.en: She sank two glasses of white wine.
sentences.cn: 她一口气干了两杯白葡萄酒。

sentences.en: Some of the finest drinking glasses are made from lead crystal.
sentences.cn: 一些最高档的酒杯是用铅晶质玻璃制成的。

sentences.en: When they'd gone, McMinn tidied away the glasses and tea-cups.
sentences.cn: 他们走后，麦克明把玻璃杯、茶杯收拾了起来。

words.tran_cn: [轻]眼镜；玻璃（glass的复数形式）；[光]双筒望远镜

trans.tran_cn: 眼镜，双筒望远镜，玻璃( glass的名词复数 )，玻璃杯，玻璃器皿，眼镜
trans.tran_en: Glasses are two lenses in a frame that some people wear in front of their eyes in order to help them see better
Glasses are two lenses in a frame that some people wear in front of their eyes in order to help them see better
